content.text: Hi! I'm a huge fan of fantasy novels and Game of Thrones. What are your favorite TV shows?
I love Game of Thrones too! My other favorite show is Stranger Things. What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading, acting, and playing video games. I'm also an actress and I work at a grocery store.
That's so cool! I've always wanted to be an actress. I work at a pet store and I love my dog Bob.
I love dogs! What breed is he?
He's a mutt, but he looks like a golden retriever.
That sounds adorable! I'm glad you have such a great companion.
Thanks! I am too. What are you looking forward to in the future?
I'm looking forward to saving up enough money to move out of my parents' house. I also want to train my dog to behave in a new country.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be able to do both of those things. What country are you moving to?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking about moving to Europe.
That would be amazing! I've always wanted to travel to Europe.
Me too! I think it would be so much fun to experience different cultures and see new places
